website_summaries.verdict: This foaming cleanser receives a high ranking for balancing skin's pH levels naturally, without using any chemicals or creating dry skin.
pros: Has a mild and pleasant lavender scent
Effective in reducing redness and oil, but doesn’t dry out skin
Also helpful in clearing up symptoms of Rosacea
Shrinks pore size over time, creating a more even complexion
Bottle pump creates a generous lather
cons: This product received mixed reviews in relation to its ability to remove makeup

website_summaries.verdict: A mild, non-detergent cleanser that is designed for sensitive and oily skin types.
pros: This product cleanses skin of makeup and toxins without stripping it of its natural oils
cons: It does not offer other benefits than gentle cleansing -- which is not a deterrent to all users

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to leave reviews, but I’m thoroughly impressed with this product. I’ve struggled with cystic acne for 15 years. I got it under control the last 10 years or so with occasional breakouts. Then something happened about a month ago and I had the worst breakout I’ve had since my teen years. Nothing was helping. I received this face wash this past Wednesday and 6 days later, my face is FINALLY going back to normal. I’m shocked. Picture is not of my original break out, but just the condition my skin was in on Wednesday when I received the product in the mail, and then this morning, 6 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Linebargers

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I mean wow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled with my skin my whole life. I first bought the facial mist and noticed my acne starting to fade. So I bought the eye cream and this cleanser. I have naturally oily skin btw. My acne is gone! I use it religiously. Wash my face with the cleanser morning and night. Spray the facial mist morning and night. I apply the eye cream at night. I’m very pleased with the product and it’s the only thing that’s ever worked for me. I look forward to the continued results!
customer_reviews.author: Kindell Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comes with an actual soapberry!!
customer_reviews.text: I found the face wash after falling in love with the shampoo. I was using the shampoo on my face in the shower after reading about the antibacterial properties of soapberries and it worked at improving my skins appearance. I have been using the foaming facewash and love how gently and light it is on my face. My skin looks great and I feel good about what I’m putting on my face! An added bonus is that each product comes with an actual soapberry that you can plant!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product. Smells heavenly and natural and lathers well. I never ever write reviews but this product is too good not to. This wash is super gentle on my extremely sensitive skin and have really helped balance out my complextion, and control my acne (which i have been struggling with for 5+ years). I am super grateful I found this product! I also had a shipping issue and they fixed it right away! Excellent costumer service, incredible company, incredible products. will definitely recommend this product to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but very effective, reduces pore size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this face wash. Have tried many face wash but none have worked (one containing salicylic acid which made my skin worse and the ones with Benzol peroxide which made my skin dry and irritates). This super product is so gentle but yet very effectively, leave my skin clean and oil free. I have noticed a reduction in my pore size too.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit K

customer_reviews.title: Great for my rosacea
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is great! Gives my face a nice tingly clean without over drying and seems to really help my rosacea, which is great because previously the only thing that worked was prescription cream or Rodan + Fields, which are both quite pricey. I had this bottle for about a month and use it daily and I still have over half the bottle left. I also have very sensitive skin and was concerned this would trigger it, but it actually seems to calm the redness and irritation. Highly recommend this face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsalad Jazzmatron

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the Peppermint smell, but I've used it for two weeks now and can't tell a difference......if anything my face got worse. I'm going to continue using it regularly, and will update as time passes. It seems like a great product for oily skin, which I have, but you definitely need moisturizer after as it feels like it dries out my skin more than other products
customer_reviews.author: Ahchico

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is so natural and gentle. I am pregnant and was looking for a gentle fashwash with no chemicals/filler/etc. and that would help with my acne. This product has worked very well and I'm hooked! No turning back! This face wash is very liquidy, not thick or like a cream at all. It suds up well thanks to the Soapberries and does make my face feel clean. When I saw the consistency I was skeptical but it truly does what it says! Life changing for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Smell, Fun and Foamy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product dispenses. It's like one of those hand sanitizer bottles or the Bath and Body Works foaming soap. It just feels really smooth across my face. I will note that it's a pretty strong smell, but I don't really mind it. I guess it smells clean and natural. The only complaint is it seems like it's going to run out pretty quickly if you use one pump per wash. I use it twice a day and like it!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clean skin care cleanser. I have dry skin and use after oil cleanse. Does not strip skin- very gentle and most importantly it is ph balanced. I don’t use a lot of cleanser but have gone through the bottle much quicker than I normally do- usually cleansers last forever in my house, so I am a little disappointed in the small bottle for the price. Very high quality tho and I have normal to dry skin. I’m using in the summertime
customer_reviews.author: Natalieeee

customer_reviews.title: Delightful face wash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash for a few weeks now, and I would have to say, I'm impressed. The scent is pleasant and not overwhelming, this cleanser is very gentle and calms my inflamed skin. I like knowing that I am using a product that won't harm the environment, nor my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Removes makeup really well!
customer_reviews.text: Adding a comment: It seems the recipe changed a bit, this last bottle I got smells A LOT more plant like. I don't smell any peppermint. This is the first bottle that smells this way. Only been using this for a week so far, but really like it so far! The foam feels nice and soft on my face and I like the smell. It is REALLY good at washing off makeup. My last organic face wash wouldn't clean off makeup at all. Definitely like this one better than other organic face washes I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: crystal Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Made already moderate acne worse
customer_reviews.text: I had been using my daughters baby wipes to clean my face since there is virtually nothing in them but wanted something more for my acne. I saw this peppermint face wash product and thought it was going to improve my skin even more. I used it for a few weeks and my acne got worse, not better. So I thought it was my moisturizer. So I got the unscented lotion and the citrus body wash and now I am fully broken out worse than ever and my head is so itchy. I have never been diagnosed with any allergy’s but this has been awful for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Graves

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. It's soft and gentle on the skin and smells invigorating! This is my second repurchase. I use it day and night. My first bottle lasted 8 months!!
customer_reviews.author: mai lor

customer_reviews.title: Smells incredible and it works!!
customer_reviews.text: The peppermint smells amazing! I get excited every time I wash my face. Really clears up the skin if you have any blemishes or acne. I have very dry skin especially in during the colder seasons... this has been helping me out a ton. Going to buy the lavender scent next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t helped as much as I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews says this has help with acne and their skin but I have been using it for about a month and I can’t see any diference. I may just be my skin so I don’t want someone to not give it a try because of my review. I have oily skin with adult acne and if you have the same maybe this isn’t the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: LMK1992

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but I can't use it
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this face wash and it feels nice on my skin. I've been using it for almost 2 weeks. I switched from a three step acne kit. Unfortunately, I think I'm allegic to it as I've been getting small red bumps all over my face so I won't be using it any longer. It is definitely worth a try though as the product seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the smell of this product and it doesn’t do much for clearing acne as I was hoping it would do since it’s a “natural” product. But if you’re looking for a simple face wash this is good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a good foam cleanser that smells good, natural ingredients, washes clear (after oil cleanser), and doesn't make your face feel tight and dry. Soothing, soft and clean skin feel after using... worth the money if you got it!
customer_reviews.author: MsSweetJames

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT rinse off completely and is def slightly drying
customer_reviews.text: I was really shocked after reading all the positive to find that this soap leaves a film on your face even after a very thorough rinsing, and the leftover film has a drying effect on the skin. I sent this soap back immediately and will look for another truly clean and pure liquid soap for the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used the facewash but this is my second time ordering it and I can say it works better than anything I've ever tried from a drugstore. I have tried so many other things to try and help several issues with my face, but the product may have helped one thing but caused something else like itching and dry skin. Now I have found something that clears my acne and makes my face so smooth and even, it is the best facewash I have found and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the unscented soap and I really love it. I bought peppermint because my usual face soap was out of stock. Unfortunately, the peppermint was too strong for my sensitive skin, but the seller was very helpful and gave me a refund. Otherwise, I would recommend this product if you don't have very sensitive skin. I will buy the unscented soap when it goes back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: Mild, low lather, great peppermint scent. I especially like that it is all natural with no animal ingredients or testing - that is very important to me. It washes beautifully and even takes off non-waterproof eye makeup quite well. Suitable for all skin types. I really enjoy using it!
customer_reviews.author: MDVAgal

customer_reviews.title: Made me Red and broke me out immediately
customer_reviews.text: This product made my skin very red and broke me out. I only used it for one day and I noticed it making my skin dry and inflamed so I decided to return it. The product didn’t work for me in particular, but does not mean it won’t work for you. This is just a review based on my personal experience
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: A nice change from my fashion counter face wash.
customer_reviews.text: I am middle aged with fairly good skin. If I try a new product though, I usually break out, but I did not with this. It smells envigorating, and tingles, a really great way to start a day. So far so good. My face is clean, clear, and feels soft. I would, and have recommended it to friends, especially those who seek more natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying the product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot praise this product enough. This is hands down the best facewash I’ve ever used. It’s gentle but effective in cleansing the skin. I have very sensitive skin but the products on the market are too gentle and don’t cleanse enough. It also leaves my skin feeling so clean. I would highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with irritating acne. The only negative comment I have is the price, but It’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mikula

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from Acne for 35 years and have tried everything to keep my breakouts under control. This really works to clear your skin. I stopped using a prescription acne face wash and now will only use this soap from now on. It has shrunk my points, my breakouts or now few and when I do get a pimple it’s not as extreme as normal and my blackheads have almost disappeared. Tree to Tub is the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.author: amy j kiba

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my oily is skin and this product made my skin extremely oil
customer_reviews.author: DonMarie

customer_reviews.title: Simple face wash thats effective yet delicate
customer_reviews.text: This is my third batch of this face wash and its a staple of mine, its natural and very light which is most important for me because everything else is too harsh on my face. For some people it works for some it might not but for me its worked wonders. The main ingredient is the actual soap that comes from a berry... how can you go wrong with that ? Give it a go, it might work for you and become the face wash that you've been searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this product deserved one. A lot of "all natural" products don't actually use all natural ingredients and this company lives up to their promise! It removes my makeup as well as dirt from my pores. You can feel it working. Tree to Tub also gives you a little soapberry with its history in each order and I love it. Overall a wonderful product that you can feel ethically good about using!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face wash. I live in Florida, and my skin gets sweaty and oily very quickly in our climate. This wash smells good, and leaves my face feeling really clean.
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: No harsh chemicals yet does the job
customer_reviews.text: I really like the refreshing mint smell. It isn’t harsh on my sensitive skin and leaves my face feeling clean, not covered with residue or dried out.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Experienced Review
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this cleanser feels great! I love it, but does it take everything off? No. Here is the test. Put "Take the Day off" by Clinique on a cotton ball afterwards. I use this AFTERwards. A natural grand finale. I haven't found anything better to get off makeup than "Take the Day Off".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This definitely works
customer_reviews.text: My skin’s been struggling for months and after trying several other chemical products that contain sacrylic acid and benzoyl peroxide that didn’t seem to work very well I came across this and my skin was noticeably clearer after the first use and continues to look clearer every time I use it, These soapberries definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Featherstone

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite face wash that I have ever used! It smells wonderful and my skin feels so refreshed after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn Benning

customer_reviews.title: Best Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! One of the more pricey products, but it's worth it! Not only does it have a light peppermint refreshing scent, but it always leaves my face feeling clean and soft. I have always struggled with oily, acne prone skin. This seems to be the only product I can use that helps and doesn't over dry my skin! So thankful I found it!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: i really like this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but very effective at taking off make up and leaving the skin feeling clean but not over dried. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything to help my acne or blackheads the only thing it did was dry out my hands super super bad
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for your face!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have tried many many products but honestly, this product is the best. Trust me, you dont need to medicate your face to see results. Use this all natural product instead! I noticed an immediate reduction in my breakouts and my skin looks so much healthier. Bonus, the essential oils make it smell amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I love the face wash! It lathered up really nicely with only one pump needed. The awakening peppermint left my face feeling clean and fresh. I'm excited to continue using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: A Facial Cleanser that didnt leave my skin dried out!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the peppermint face wash and it was hands down my favorite facial cleaner that I have ever used. I've always struggled with acne and every home treatment or cleaner that I used before would leave my skin dry and itchy. When I discovered Tree to Tub that changed not only did it leave my skin clean and remove the excess oil I could instantly see that it hadn’t dried my skin to the point of the heavier washes and pads that I had used before
customer_reviews.author: Caylon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute packaging! I am really liking this face wash. I feel like it is good for my skin because there are not any harsh ingredients. It doesn’t suds up as much as I’m used to but that’s ok. Two squirts and it cleans my whole face. You need to moisturize after.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thick lather leaves face feeling clean and not overly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Dpackard

customer_reviews.title: Super effective
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Love this product; its help minimize by breakouts without drying my skin.
customer_reviews.author: jporter9

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Although I just started using the face wash yesterday, it is already my favorite. The peppermint smell and amazing foamy consistency is amazing. My other face washes are too harsh on my skin as they are more of a creamy consistency, but the face wash by Tree to Tub is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Yonghua Lu

customer_reviews.title: Mild, effective, and fresh
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner effectively cuts through oil without drying out my skin. Additionally, using a facial cleanser that is already in "foam" form is very user friendly. Very good product for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: jfam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Repurchased this 3 times already. Great for combination skin. My skin has never been so clean in the last 10 years, I've finally found the product for me.
customer_reviews.author: yolo

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the raw unscented and peppermint version. Both cleaned my face really well, but the raw unscented version broke me out after every use. So far, I'm really liking the peppermint version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash
customer_reviews.text: This product has been everything my face needed. I have very sensitive skin and semi acne prone. I needed something that would still clean my pores but not strip it of all it’s moisture. I have been using this for two years now and my face looks clean and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Feel so clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this face wash for about a week. It makes your face feel so clean. It keeps it fresh throughout the day and doesn’t produce more oil. I am impatient as to waiting for skin to clear up, but I have high hopes for this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice clean wash for my face
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice clean wash for my face. I gave it 4 stars because it's very runny. I would like it heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I first used the non scented version and loved it! At first I thought it was it bit pricey, but it lasted forever!! Plus the fact that it has great ingredients! I went ahead and purchased this scent and it smells great! It doesn't irritate my skin but cleans it with make my face feel dry!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mendez

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC IN A BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: IM SO INLOVE! It’s only been a little over a week but my skin looks amazing. Not over drying but def works on my oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good price point and product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using different soapberry products for a couple of years now and this one is in my top choices. I love the scent of peppermint and the clean, smooth feeling after rinsing. I’ve been using it for 2 weeks now, everyday as a regular cleanser and I can see a noticeable change in my skin. I’ll be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T. M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It doesn't produce a lot of foam so its better do use with a wash cloth. I let it sit on my skin for about a minute then I rinse with warm water. I do this before bed and my skin is just glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Tudor Gradinariu

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love how this product feels on my skin! It makes your face so smooth! I've tried lots of over the counter chemical based products and they all suck compared to the all natural beauty supplies like this face wash! Smells very nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, and everything that is meant for acne is too harsh for me! Except for this product, my skin has never felt so good! My acne is clearing up daily! Overall, I will continue to buy this product! I’m extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Vivo

customer_reviews.title: Use It Every Other Day For Awesome Results
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! My face is normally oily and this fixes that COMPLETELY! If I use it too many days in a row, my face does get dry. So I tend to use it every other day! And it smells and feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not effective
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, unfortunately did not help my acne at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tressler

customer_reviews.title: I really like this facial soap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this facial soap. It has a nice smell and when I use it in the morning it helps wake me up because of the peppermint. I feel like it cleans well and doesn’t make me break out. I will defiantly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is great very foamy and gentle and smells great. Can’t wait to keep using to see results.
customer_reviews.author: oxy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, the best
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second bottle. I have used so many different face washes but nothing beats this. I use it in the AM and PM and it doesn't dry out my skin. My breakouts are at a minimum and I finally feel comfortable not wearing makeup everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY sensitive skin. I have tried all kinds of products. This is the only face wash that has really helped my skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Stitts

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Big difference from everything else I’ve used. Clean, healthy, natural product. Highly recommend this. My face cleared up as soon as I started using this and stopped my other face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love how clean my face feels after using this product. My skin is soft and my breakouts have started to clear up! One small pump of the cleanser is plenty to clean with and the subtle peppermint scent is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was fantastic, it smelled great
customer_reviews.text: This product was fantastic, it smelled great, was packaged super nice and it did help lighten my skin, unfortunately I did have to get something a little stronger due to the fact that I have hormonal acne, if I could I would still use this.
customer_reviews.author: lael

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the better products I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better products I have tried! I usually know within 24 hours if a product is going to work, and this does! Peppermint is the best! Yes I would recommend it to people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is our new go to. It works extremely well and is gentle enough for very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jovita

customer_reviews.title: Allergy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been allergic to any product, except this one. And after my trying 3 times to 100% verify it's the cause, it was passed the return window. Drop it as garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s made my face feel so soft and clean without drying it out. I love the smell and feel of it. I’m very excited about the naturally derived ingredients. I’ve passed it on to my teenage daughters to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: slk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It smells great but it doesn't help with breakouts. I also like the tingly mint feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lbdunn

customer_reviews.title: Ingredient list. See pic.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the product yet but someone asked for an ingredient list. See pic attached.
customer_reviews.author: ErinS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cleanser. Fresh minty scent and leaves skin clean.
customer_reviews.author: Never Smile at Strangers

customer_reviews.title: really makes your skin smooth and nice to touch
customer_reviews.text: really makes your skin smooth and nice to touch, with the refreshing peppermint surprise! though I only used it once, I am hoping to get more long run results too. will update!
customer_reviews.author: Inbal

customer_reviews.title: ... this face wash for two weeks now and I love it. No more breakouts and my fave feels ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash for two weeks now and I love it. No more breakouts and my fave feels so smooth . A must try .
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Nicosia

customer_reviews.title: great natural cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Cleanses my combination skin without overly drying and causing excess oil production. Gentle on sensitive skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Childers

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Lasted me between 2-3 months and helped clear up my skin. It smells great and the cooling sensation when I put it on is a nice way to let me know it's working
customer_reviews.author: TMal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell and feels good on face. I use it 2-3 times a day! Face feels better than before
customer_reviews.author: Traut B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect soap for my sensitive face. Used it for almost a year now. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this smells and how gentle it is on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked this a lot
customer_reviews.text: It worked for me right away. Not too strong of a smell, I got one with peppermint. Not like regular soap, doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Super clean, super gentle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! It's very simple, gentle and super cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rae Houghaboom

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Love the peppermint scent! Great natural face wash. Can’t waitto try the other varieties!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These products have been great for my skin and hair. They’re lightweight and don’t leave any residue and my skin feels like it can breathe again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser saved my life. I have tried everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser saved my life. I have tried everything from Cetaphil to Burts Bees and everything broke me out- not badly but I always had at least one or two pimples. And my face never felt totally smooth. And then I found this. I use the Lavender one, and it has saved my face. I'm so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Jg

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, face feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this face wash. It is full of lots of great ingredients, and I was so excited to try soapberries, since I have been intrigued by them for years. Love the little bit of tingle from the peppermint. Leaves my skin feeling great and so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Eirhart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product! I love how foaming it is and that it totally removes all the makeup and dirt!

customer_reviews.title: Super clean without drying out skin
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful foam texture, and cleans, and removes all makeup without drying out your skin. In the mornings the light mint aroma is a nice pick me up as well :).
customer_reviews.author: Shalee H.

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, oily, acne prone skin. This product made my face feel so clean and fresh. I found my new facewash!

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash to clean and wake you right up
customer_reviews.text: Great face wash to clean and wake you right up. Very refreshing and feels like a deep cleanser but is not super intense on the skin and leaves a minty aroma after cleansing. Highly recommend this brand and to anyone that needs a little boost in their day.

product_meta.title: Gentle, Acne Face Wash for Oily Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Refreshing Peppermint Foaming Cleanser for Sensitive Skin. Women and Mens Face Wash from Wild Soapberries, Organic Aloe Vera 4 oz
feature_bullets: 🌱 KIND TO OILY SKIN: It’s natural to want a balancing acne cleanser that removes all traces of makeup, while leaving your skin clean and fresh without stimulating excess oil. So that’s why we use only Wild Soapberry and Organic Balancing Botanicals in our Cleanser for Oily Skin. You’ll naturally agree it’s incredibly deep cleansing, while surprisingly balancing for oily skin.

🌱 BALANCE YOUR SKIN’S NATURAL OILS: For airbrushed, plump facial skin, you must maintain its acidic pH around 5.5. And that’s exactly why soapberry has been used for millennia. We simply added the coconut cleansers, Shea Moisture, and Aloe Vera, Acai and Chamomile. So, for acne, blemishes and oily skin control, this oil balancing formula is the real hydration your skin is thirsting for.

🌱 GENTLE PEPPERMINT SCENT: You know the loopholes that allow some natural face wash brands to include harsh chemicals. And this means residue, irritation, excess oils, and strong fragrance. Instead, we are simply Wild, Gentle and Pure. Forget ‘natural’ - this is pure skincare harvested from nature, including the natural peppermint oil. And for the perfect combo, add our body wash and lotion.

🌱 JUST PURITY. NOTHING WEIRD: It’s obvious this Face Wash for women and men is also free from Toxins, Sulfates, SLS, Parabens, Silicone, DEA/MEA, Gluten and Artificial Fragrance. It’s Dermatologist Recommended, it’s Gentle and safe for kids. The best part is that it's Vegan, Cruelty Free, Fair Trade, and Sustainably harvested in eco-reserves in Taiwan, protecting local habitat.

🌱 TRIAL IT & FEEL [YOU KEEP THE FREE GIFT]: Your order today also comes with a free wild soapberry! This is nature’s original Low pH face wash with pure saponin for a gentle, cleansing lather that’s naturally balancing. Once you’ve discovered its wild beauty, take your acne free face cleanser and enjoy using it day and night. Love your Soapberry Skin - or we’ll refund every cent.
